What's your ideal way to spend a Friday night?

Most folks I know seem to think Friday night is some kind of sacred ritual.  A time to shed the week's skin and become something...more.  They pack themselves into noisy, crowded places, chasing fleeting connections and manufactured excitement.

Me? I'll be right here.
